title: NEED HELP!! STUCK ON "Logging on..."
body: Someone please help me. I have been having an issue with my league client that started a couple of days ago. Whenever i try to log in to league i get stuck on "Logging on" and it continues to stay like that. I've tried resetting my router and pc. It's been like this for a week now and im really desperate for some help. If you know anything that can help, let me know please. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Still experiencing this issue?

Could you please run through the [Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) and [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support articles for me, let me know if anything helps.
Checked to make sure you don't have anti virus and/or firewalls blocking your signals to the server?
